item.title: Dive into K8s: Hand-Rolling CNI with Kind, From CrashLoop to VXLAN Packet Capture
item.description: This weekend, I built a “networkless” cluster from scratch on Manjaro using kind, manually debugged missing kernel modules and CNI plugins, and finally witnessed the VXLAN encapsulation process with tcpdump. This post documents the entire journey.
